bio:
Hello............................my name is Imtiyaj Ali ⭐WordPress Developer Specialist⭐

Are you looking for a WordPress developer who will take on your project, set you free from headaches, and be available when you need him? Here you will find everything you need.

As a WordPress developer, I follow modern web development practices and use new technologies; as a person who never stops learning; as a person who is trustworthy, responsible, respects deadlines, and knows that customer satisfaction is essential.

It has been almost 6 years since I started working as a WordPress Developer. The areas of expertise I have are WordPress, Woocommerce, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and responsive coding. Excellent attention to detail, good at multitasking and handling multiple pressing projects at once. On top of the latest trends and technologies.

PSD/Sketch to WordPress theme coding and PSD/Sketch to HTML/CSS coding, ACF plugin-based custom themes are my specialty.

The following is a guarantee:

- A quick response time
- Ability to communicate effectively
- Optimized for SEO, tableless markup, and load speed;
- The testing and compatibility of the site with different browsers;
- A post-contract support service is available

If you are interested in working with me, please don't hesitate to contact me!

Best regards
Imtiyaj Ali

services.title: Proofreading
description: Proofreading confirms that the finished version of your book/manuscript, article, story, email, blog post, report, webpage content, and other written materials is identical to the copyedited version.

abstrac: Your message at its very best
bio:
I’ve been writing, editing, and proofreading professionally for twenty-five years. I graduated from Eckerd College in St. Petersburg, Florida with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Creative Writing. I’m an award-winning newspaper reporter and an experienced medical, dental, and healthcare marketing writer, having worked with physicians, dentists, chiropractors, and other healthcare professionals in a wide range of specialties. Writing is not a hobby or side job for me; it is my full-time occupation.

For many years, I was active on Guru.com, earning a five-star rating for the quality of my work and customer service. After several years away from Guru.com, I’ve reactivated my membership, and I look forward to assisting clients all around the country with their writing, editing, and proofreading tasks.

My goal is to help my clients present themselves and their products or services in the best possible light. I understand the importance of working with clients closely to achieve their goals. I also understand the importance of meeting deadlines. As a writer, I pride myself on working with clients who know what they want to say but don't know how to say it, and delivering clean, clear, concise, and engaging copy. As an editor, I have a knack for finding mistakes other editors miss. As a proofreader, I excel at scrutinizing proofs to ensure they’re clean and ready for submission or self-publication.

In addition to my career as a freelance writer and editor, I also have a creative side. Earlier in my life, I was active in the Tampa Bay area as an arts organization manager and booker, emcee, performer, and recording artist. Scrapbook, my debut music and poetry CD, was released in 1998 and was followed by Thoughts From Seclusion in 2000, All Things To All People in 2003, and Drive in 2006.

I enjoy cooking, collecting CDs and DVDs, dining out, rooting for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, and continuing my quest for the perfect glass of iced tea.

I work only with Employers who agree to use SafePay.

I prefer to communicate via email three or four times a week. I work Monday through Friday – 9:00am to 5:00pm EST – but my availability on Tuesday and Thursday is very limited. However, I’m quick to answer Guru messages, so don't hesitate to write with any questions.

Honest feedback from Employers is appreciated and will be reciprocated with honest feedback to Employers.

Code of Ethics – I strive to deal openly and honestly with my Employers. I expect the same in return. I meet my Employers’ deadlines. In return, I expect my Employers to release the agreed-upon funds at the agreed-upon time. Each project is a team effort. My Employer can expect me to live up to my responsibilities in completing the Employer’s project. I expect the Employer (and the Employer’s employees or agents) to live up to his or her responsibilities in completing the project. 

Objectionable Material – I reserve the right to decline working on material that in my sole judgment is offensive, objectionable, unethical, or illegal.

abstrac: New Age Writing. Old World Storytelling,
bio:
Cecilia is a mother to three teenagers and four cats. And while tending her farm and painting takes up part of the day, ghostwriting novels transport her to wherever the ink may flow at night.

Thus, twelve years have passed. And while the kids have grown from rambunctious toddlers to independent teenagers, and the saplings now tower as trees, her writing has evolved from serious non-fiction how-tos to flights of fantasy that span multiple genres.

Cecilia is best known to her clients for delivering powerful stories told in eloquent narratives. Entertaining, certainly. Compelling, definitely. But most of all, whether it's romance or suspense, thrillers or science fiction, her stories are compelling, nuanced, and real.

Payment upon satisfactory completion. 
Guaranteed original plot and prose.
Deadlines guaranteed or its free.

Having a competitive edge in design, particularly when it comes to customization and innovation along with having an artistic sense, the team at MicroArts is passionate and filled with a creative zeal solely driven by the principles of invention, transcendence, novelty and newness.
Highly flexible according to needs and demands of our Respectable Employers.

bio:
Hello there!!! I am a Digital Artist and Graphic Designer with 10+ years of experience in the following areas: 

• Wine and Beverage Label design
• Packaging design
• Surface Pattern Design and Textile Design for craft paper and wallpapers
• Ink Illustrator for Coloring Books and Pages
• Book Illustrations and Cover design
• Album art and Cover design
• Logo and branding design 
• T-Shirt design
• Advertising materials, Posters, Flyers, Brochures
• Traditional drawings and paintings, Murals 

I love the diversity in my work and my greatest passion is to visualize the story behind your brand in a unique and creative way. Using the skills I have in traditional drawing and education in fine arts, I can bring ideas to life and make your products stand out. 

I would be glad to know more about your projects and also how can I help :)

Payment terms –  Guru SafePay 
Preferred communication style – Guru messages / e-mail / Viber / WhatsApp
